name: Generatorhallen.github.io
body:
### About Generatorhallen AB
We do web stuff, there are currently two branches of this company that focuses on two different areas.

#### Games
[The Sims Resource](http://www.thesimsresource.com) We are running the worlds largest and oldest The Sims fan-site.
[Planet Destiny](http://www.planetdestiny.com) We have recently started a new site about [Destiny](http://www.destinythegame.com/). We have big plans for it.

We are planning to add more game sites in the near future.

#### Hemsidadirekt
[Hemsidadirekt](http://www.hemsidadirekt.se) is a complete website solution for small and medium sized businesses.

### Jobs
We've currently looking for an additional developer/operator on the Games department, [more details](http://generatorhallen.github.io/jobs).

### Contact
Generatorhallen AB is based in Söderhamn, Sweden.
Phone: +46 (0)270-14130

Address
Kungsgatan 3
826 30 Söderhamn
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
